00034 require_once("setup.inc");
00035 
00036 function hash2cmdline(&$args) {
00037     reset($args);
00038     $cmdline = '';
00039 
00040     foreach($args as $key => $value) {
00041     $cmdline .= " ".escapeshellarg($value);
00042     }
00043 
00044     return $cmdline;
00045 }
00046 
00047 function get_extension($filename) {
00048     preg_match("/\.([^\.]+)$/", $filename, $match);
00049     if (isset($match[1])) {
00050     return $match[1];
00051     } else {
00052     return '';
00053     }
00054 }
00055 
00056 function normalise_filename($filename) {
00057     /* remove basename and trailing extension from filename */
00058     $filename = basename($filename);
00059     if (preg_match("/^([^\.]+)/", $filename, $match)) {
00060     $filename = $match[1];
00061     }
00062     /* remove all but lowercase and digits */
00063     $filename = preg_replace("/[^a-z0-9_]/", '', $filename);
00064 
00065     return $filename;
00066 }
00067 
00068 function save($filename, &$data) {
00069     $fh = fopen($filename, 'w');
00070 
00071     if (!$fh) {
00072     runtime_error('tools: cannot open file "'.$filename.'" for writing');
00073     return 0;
00074     }
00075 
00076     if (is_array($data)) {
00077     $mydata = join("\xa", $data);
00078     } else {
00079     $mydata = $data;
00080     }
00081 
00082     $result = fwrite($fh, $mydata);
00083 
00084     fflush($fh);
00085     fclose($fh);
00086 
00087     return $result;
00088 }
00089 
00090 function load($filename) {
00091     global $symon;
00092 
00093     $fh = fopen($filename, 'r');
00094 
00095     if (!$fh) {
00096     runtime_error('tools: cannot open file "'.$filename.'" for reading');
00097     return 0;
00098     }
00099 
00100     $data = fread($fh, $symon['loadbuffer']);
00101 
00102     fclose($fh);
00103 
00104     return $data;
00105 }
00106 
00107 function config_error($item, $problem) {
00108     global $symon;
00109     print("\xa\xa".'<b>check setup.inc: $symon["'.$item.'"]="'.
00110     $symon[$item].'" '.$problem);
00111     exit(1);
00112 }
00113 
00114 function runtime_error($problem) {
00115     print("\xa\xa<b>".$problem.'</b>');
00116     error_log($problem);
00117     exit(1);
00118 }
00119 
00120 function warning($problem) {
00121     print("\xa\xa<b>".$problem.'</b>');
00122     error_log($problem);
00123 }
